title: and 2 of Part 22 of the Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2024 (commencement) order 2025

title: and 2 of Part 22 of the Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024)
heading: 2. The 9th day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which Chapters 1
text_raw:
2. The 9th day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which Chapters 1 
and 2 of Part 22 of the Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 June, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [239] 3
